name: HALO_PROTOCOL()
effect: Overshield gained from HALO_PROTOCOL() may stack with itself, but not Overshield from any other source. HALO_PROTOCOL() does not count towards your AI limit.

actions.name: Watchful Gaze
actions.detail: You gain 3 Overshield, and Allied Characters within Sensors and Line Of Sight gain 2 Overshield.

description: “Our greatest shield is the righteousness of our Mission, for through His message, shall God’s will be known.” - Excerpt, Teachings of St Tellus Vol XIV, circa 5011u
